description: This source file implements parameter retrieval and setting functions for a module related to xHFW (likely a firewall or security framework). It provides getter and setter functions for various string, boolean, uLong, and integer parameters, as well as commit functionality. The code interacts with a global g_xhfw_ssp structure for fetching and setting values through callbacks, and manages parameters such as status, whitelist URL, AWS endpoints, firmware download URL, and certificate issuer name.

methods.name: BOOL XHFW_GetParamStringValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,char * pParamName,char * pValue,ULONG * pUlSize)
methods.description: Retrieves string parameters based on parameter name, such as status, whitelist URL, AWS endpoint, firmware download URL, and certificate issuer CA name from callbacks in g_xhfw_ssp.

methods.name: BOOL XHFW_GetParamBoolValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,char * pParamName,BOOL * pBool)
methods.description: Retrieves boolean parameters such as AWS enabled and UServer enabled states via callbacks.

methods.name: BOOL XHFW_GetParamUlongValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,char * pParamName,ULONG * puLong)
methods.description: Stub function returning FALSE, indicating no ULONG parameters are retrieved here.

methods.name: BOOL XHFW_GetParamIntValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,char * pParamName,int * pInt)
methods.description: Stub function returning FALSE, indicating no Integer parameters are retrieved here.

methods.name: BOOL XHFW_SetParamStringValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,char * pParamName,char * pString)
methods.description: Sets string parameters such as SAT, activate, whitelist URL, AWS endpoint, firmware download URL, and certificate issuer CA name through respective callbacks.

methods.name: BOOL XHFW_SetParamBoolValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,char * pParamName,BOOL bValue)
methods.description: Sets boolean parameters such as reset, restart, AWS enabled, and UServer enabled via callbacks.

methods.name: BOOL XHFW_SetParamUlongValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,char * pParamName,ULONG uValue)
methods.description: Stub function returning FALSE, indicating no ULONG parameters are set here.

methods.name: BOOL XHFW_SetParamIntValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,char * pParamName,int iValue)
methods.description: Stub function returning FALSE, indicating no Integer parameters are set here.

methods.name: ULONG XHFW_Commit(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext)
methods.description: Placeholder for commit operation, currently returns 0.
